bibl.title: Ἀρσινοΐτης νομός. Administration of the Fayum under Roman Rule.

series.title: The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume

bibl.note: Introduction. - Chapter One. The place of Ἀρσινοΐτης νομός in the Egyptian Administrative System under Roman Rule. - Chapter Two. The Central Administration of the Nome. The Merides. - Chapter Three. The Arsinoite Toparchies. - Chapter Four. Komogrammateiai. Village Officials (Komogrammateis, Presbyteroi acting as Komogrammateis, Amphodogrammateis, Komarchai). - Chapter Five. The Arsinoite Pagi. Unification of the Administrative Structures. - Conclusion. - Bibliography. Indices.
bibl.seg: DERDA Tomasz, Ἀρσινοΐτης νομός. Administration of the Fayum under Roman Rule. (The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume VII.)
Warsaw, The Journal of Juristic Papyrology, 2006, 8°, xviii-345 pp., front. coul., 2 tabl., 4 cartes. ISBN 83-918250-6-X.

Introduction. - Chapter One. The place of Ἀρσινοΐτης νομός in the Egyptian Administrative System under Roman Rule. - Chapter Two. The Central Administration of the Nome. The Merides. - Chapter Three. The Arsinoite Toparchies. - Chapter Four. Komogrammateiai. Village Officials (Komogrammateis, Presbyteroi acting as Komogrammateis, Amphodogrammateis, Komarchai). - Chapter Five. The Arsinoite Pagi. Unification of the Administrative Structures. - Conclusion. - Bibliography. Indices.
C.R. par Peter Fibiger Bang, BMCRev < http://bmcr.brynmawr.edu/2008/2008-11-10.html >. - Alan K. Bowman, JRS 98 (2008) p. 222. - Peter van Minnen, BASP 46 (2009) pp. 267-270.
